info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 2:11PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Laurens, southeastern Spartanburg and central Union Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 211 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles southwest of Union, or 7 miles west of Rose Hill State Park, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Union, Monarch Mill, Buffalo, Jonesville, Rose Hill State Park, Cross Keys, Cross Anchor, Sedalia and Santuc. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
